column4: I get this error when I try to start mysql...  * Starting MySQL database server mysqld                                                       [ OK ]
error: 'Access denied for user 'debian-sys-maint'@'localhost' (using password: YES)'
I just restored database backups from file
try logging in to mysqladmin... mysqladmin -u root -p
I get a list of options
nothing.. it would ask u for the password
or u can mysqladmin -u root -ppassword (without a space)
could it have something to do with me copying over files from another database?
